All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AnimatedGif
GIF encoder using standard LZW compression; can write animated and non-animated GIF images.
AnimatedPNG
Full-color animated PNG encoder with compression.
AnimationWriter
A common interface for various formats that can write an animated image to a FileHandle or OutputStream.
Dithered
A renderer and/or writer that allows selecting a Dithered.DitherAlgorithm for its output.
Dithered.DitherAlgorithm
Represents a choice of dithering algorithm to apply when writing a high-color image with a color-limited format.
FastAPNG
Deprecated.
Use AnimatedPNG instead.
FastGif
GIF encoder using standard LZW compression; can write animated and non-animated GIF images.
FastPalette
This is just like PaletteReducer, except that it uses a higher-quality, slower color difference calculation when creating a palette.
FastPNG
An almost-drop-in replacement for PixmapIO.PNG, optimized for speed at the expense of features.
FastPNG8
PNG-8 encoder with compression; can write animated and non-animated PNG images in indexed-mode.
OtherMath
Various math functions that don't fit anywhere else, mostly relating to the shape of a distribution.
OtherMath.BiasGain
A wrapper around OtherMath.barronSpline(float, float, float) to use it as an Interpolation.
PaletteReducer
Data that can be used to limit the colors present in a Pixmap or other image, here with the goal of using 256 or less colors in the image (for saving indexed-mode images).
PaletteReducer.IntComparator
Just like Comparator, but compares primitive ints.
PNG8
PNG-8 encoder with compression; can write animated and non-animated PNG images in indexed-mode.
QualityPalette
This is just like PaletteReducer, except that it uses a higher-quality, slower color difference calculation when creating a palette.
